briefdescription.para: The previous state of the app.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: RGBLED Control Task application entry point. This function performs app initialization, then waits for the cFE ES Startup Sync, then executes the main processing loop.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: If there is an unrecoverable failure during initialization the main loop is never executed and the application will exit.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: RGBLED Control application initialization routine. This function performs all the required startup steps to initialize (or restore from CDS) RGBLED data structures and get the application registered with the cFE services so it can begin to receive command messages and send events.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Initialize Event Services and Event tables.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to setup cFE Event Services for use by the RGBLED application.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Initialize global variables used by RGBLED application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to initialize the RGBLED application data.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to setup initialize the cFE Software Bus message pipes and subscribe to messages for the RGBLED application.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Receive and process messages from the scheduler pipe.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function receives and processes messages for the RGBLED application from the SCH pipe. This function will pend for the type defined by iBlocking, allowing it to wait for messages, i.e. wakeup messages from scheduler.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_PEND_FOREVER, CFE_SB_POLL or millisecond timeout

briefdescription.para: RGBLED Control Task incoming command processing.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function processes incoming commands subscribed by RGBLED application

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function processes command messages specific to the RGBLED application

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_Msg_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function sends the housekeeping message

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function verifies the command message length.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_Msg_t pointer that references the software bus message
The expected length of the message

simplesect.para: if the message length matches expectations, FALSE if it does not.
